tool.name: qiime2 vsearch fastq-stats

param.name: __q2galaxy__GUI__select__

param.help: [default: 1] The number of threads used for computation.

param.name: threads

param.help: [default: 1] The number of threads used for computation.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: vsearch fastq-stats ============================ Fastq stats with vsearch.
Outputs: -------- :visualization.qzv: <no description>
|
Description: ------------ A fastq overview via vsearch's fastq_stats, fastq_eestats and fastq_eestats2 utilities. Please see https://github.com/torognes/vsearch for detailed documentation of these tools.
|
